Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2009 07:27PM bloomgirl wrote: Congratulations - so glad all worked out well for you!  I was just diagnosed yesterday with "flat epithelial atypia" and will need to have a wire-guided excisional biopsy.  I appreciate hearing from you and many others that I don't have to worry about the procedure.  However, can you tell me about your recovery?  Did you have physical or other restrictions after your surgery?  How long did your recovery take? Thanks for your information and best wishes for continued health!
Posts.Title: excisional biopsy rhodagrl JayeGA
